TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IisTraceWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public NotInheritable Class IisTraceWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class IisTraceWebEventProvider sealed : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 代表將 ASP.NET 追蹤事件路由至 IIS 7.0 基礎結構的事件提供者。

span.span: Represents an event provider that routes ASP.NET tracing events to the IIS 7.0 infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視可以讓系統管理員管理已部署 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring enables administrators to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含取得健全狀況狀態資料的事件類型和處理此資料提供者類型。The namespace contains the event types that obtain health-status data and the provider types that process this data. 它也包含支援類型來協助您管理健全狀況的事件。It also contains supporting types that help you manage health events. 類別是自訂的健全狀況事件提供者處理 ASP.NET 追蹤事件的方法，透過路由[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]追蹤基礎結構。The class is a customized health-event provider that processes ASP.NET tracing events by routing them through the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] tracing infrastructure. 這個路由會只有當您啟用在 ASP.NET 中追蹤時，才發生。This routing occurs only when tracing is enabled in ASP.NET. 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). > [!NOTE] > 這個類別不會路由[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]asp.net 追蹤事件頁面上的事件。This class does not route [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] trace events into ASP.NET page events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 將事件從提供者的緩衝區移至事件記錄檔。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法時，緩衝區中的所有事件都會立即從緩衝區都移到事件記錄檔。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the event log. 這是不論自最後一個事件寫入，經過多少時間，或在緩衝區中有多少事件。This occurs regardless of how much time has elapsed since the last event was written or how many events are in the buffer. 清除動作的時間會重設上次寫入事件的時間。The time of the last written event is reset to the time of the flushing action. 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 執行與關閉提供者相關聯的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks that are associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會執行工作，讓應用程式正常結束。The method performs tasks that enable the application to end normally. 這類工作的範例關閉的資源。An example of such a task is closing resources. 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
